data.title: Good subs if your in a hurry
data.text: Have eated there several times. Noticed it to be Very clean and the sub makers are very friendly. However it is a subway shop, but the food is good and cheap.

data.title: Love All The Extras You Can Get On Your Sandwich
data.text: I love all their toppings...If you want more than what they give you they will add more till you're happy.  I can only eat the 6 inch sub and that fills me up. I like the cold cut combo extra mayo and tomatoes!!

data.title: Average Subway
data.text:
The lone staffer in there this morning did not seem too thrilled to see me walk in the door. I chatted with her as she made my breakfast and kept chatting as she rang me up. She wasn't rude, and did engage me, but I could just tell she was not having a good day.

The breakfast sandwich she made me was super hot, fresh, and tasted great, though. So, service aside, it was a great visit. :)

data.title: Warning:Paybeforeyoupee
data.text: This looked like a typical subway, just off the pedestrian bridge in Chattanooga.  My husband was planning on buying a sub but nature called so first he went headed for the bathroom.  The employee informed him that the bathrooms were not for the public and he would have to buy something.  No signs on outside of restaurant, but most I noticed most of the surrounding stores had them.  Subway quality is poor quality anyway, went to the Whole Foods down the street and had a feast...as for the bladder, well it is >90F and a humid city, we went to the Shell station, peed and bought water from them so we could pee some more! They were very friendly and non confrontational.
